Actor:GetLocation.description: Get the actor’s position in the game world

Actor:GetRotation.description: Get the actor’s rotation in the game world

Actor:SetRotation.description: Sets the actor’s rotation in the game world

Actor:SetLocation.description: Sets the actor’s location in the game world

Actor:SetCollision.description:
Sets the actor’s collision
0 - Normal
1 - Static Only
2 - No Collision

Actor:SetTintColor.description: Sets the tint color, for completely paint an object, multiply the color by 10 or 100

Actor:AttachTo.description: Attaches this Actor to any other Actor with a Relative Offset

Actor:AddImpulse.description: Applies a Force in world coordinate on this Actor (the force is applied on Client side, by the (in most of cases) the closest player of this object)

Actor:SetValue.description: Sets a value in this entity, which can be accessed by any package (local only)

Actor:GetValue.description: Gets a value given a key
